name: BallBastic!
description:
Ballbastic! is a game created to scratch the itch of hardcore gamers with an interest in games that are easy to learn but difficult to master.
  • Test your rolling skills against 150 levels across Novice, Journeyman, Expert, and Marathon Mode.
  • See how fast you can beat a difficulty level when you select Play for Time!
  • See how far you can get on a single life in Survival Mode!
  • Increase your starting life count by playing the game, enabling you to go further with every playthrough.
  • Shake up your experience with Randomizer Mode after beating every level once.
  • Learn how to utilize your environment with trampolines, rockets, teleporters, speeders, slowers, and more.
  • Travel through harder-to-reach warps to skip levels!
  • Eight different worlds, all with their own theme, from the simple mountains to the mind-boggling dreamscape.
  • Instantaneous gameplay. No instant replays when you die or score calculations when you pass a level--just keep on going!
  • A distinct pricing model: free to play and conquerable on one life, with the option to earn extra lives through gameplay or purchase for extended play sessions.
  • Featuring Brian Matt as the announcer; returning to form from narrating Super Monkey Ball games in the early 2000s.

  • Different types of cosmetic skins to unlock that prove what you are capable of doing!

  • Controller support for the main game (mouse still required for menu navigation).
